project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Implement parsing of the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a user input interface to take the city name as input
Implement the display of fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching and parsing functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correct functionality
